package.name: asr_world_model
package.description: This package contains a model which holds four types of information: 1. All estimations of objects which were localized by object detection 2. All views in which objects of given types have been searched due to advice of asr_next_best_view and asr_direct_search_manager 3. All recognized complete patterns by the recognizer_prediction_ism 4. Some additional information about the Objects: IntermediateObjectWeight, RecognizerName
package.author: Aumann Florian, Borella Jocelyn, Hutmacher Robin, Karrenbauer Oliver, Meißner Pascal, Schleicher Ralf, Stöckle Patrick, Trautmann Jeremias
